content: अनुबद्ध {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Bound, attached, tied to. {@--2@} Following in the train, coming as a consequence; अनुबद्धार्थानर्थसंशयान् विचार्य <ls>Dk. 41.</ls> {@--3@} Connected with, related to, relating or belonging to. {@--4@} Constantly sticking to, being in; continued, continuous; नित्यानुबद्धकुलवैरः <ls>Ve. 1</ls>; °मुग्धकाकलीहसितं <ls>U. 3</ls>; °विजृंभकं <ls>K. 66</ls>; °बिंदुभिरश्रुभिः <ls n="K.">135</ls> constantly flowing. {@--5@} Fixed upon, directed towards; कलहंस° वक्त्रायाः <ls>Dk. 33.</ls>
